column2: Recommendation
Use a gentle shampoo and conditioner. Consider avoiding heat styling. Stay hydrated and rest. Avoid stress. Image: [image of a gentle shampoo]

Incorporate scalp treatments twice a week. Use hair oils like coconut or olive oil. Limit hair styling. Maintain a balanced diet with proteins and vitamins. Image: [image of hair oil]
